articles.title: Ukraine nuclear plant on emergency generators after shelling cuts external power, UN says - CBC.ca
articles.description: Ukraine's Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant, the biggest in Europe, has lost its last remaining external power source as a result of renewed shelling and is now relying on emergency diesel generators, the UN nuclear watchdog said Saturday.
